title: Gemini 3 Pro vs Codeium: Which AI Tool is Better in 2025?
metaDescription: Compare Gemini 3 Pro vs Codeium. See pricing, features, pros & cons to choose the best AI tool for your needs in 2025.
introduction: Choosing between Gemini 3 Pro and Codeium? These AI tools serve different but sometimes overlapping purposes, each with unique strengths. This comparison breaks down the key differences to help you decide.

sections.title: Overview: Gemini 3 Pro vs Codeium
paragraphs: Gemini 3 Pro (llms) is Gemini 3 Pro is Google's latest flagship AI model, launched in 2025 with groundbreaking multimodal capabilities. It achieves a 76.2% score on SWE-bench Verified (surpassing Claude Sonnet 4.5's 70%), features a 1M token context window with 64K output, and uniquely offers full native video processing alongside text and images. Its key differentiator is best-in-class reasoning combined with true multimodal understanding including video, making it ideal for complex analysis and agentic workflows.. It's known for llm, multimodal, video-understanding.

Codeium (developer tools) is Codeium is an AI-powered coding assistant that provides intelligent code completion, chat, and search directly within the developer's IDE. Its key capabilities include autocomplete for over 70+ languages, a contextual chat interface for code explanations and generation, and advanced code search. It uniquely positions itself by offering a generous free tier for individual developers with no usage caps, while focusing on security and privacy with on-premise deployment options for enterprises.. Users choose it for ai-code-completion, developer-tools, ide-extension.

sections.title: Key Features
paragraphs: Gemini 3 Pro: 76.2% SWE-bench Verified score (highest available), 1M token context window with 64K output, Native video processing (unique among all models)

Codeium: AI-powered autocomplete supporting 70+ programming languages and 40+ IDEs (VS Code, JetBrains, etc.), Contextual chat interface for asking questions, generating code blocks, and explaining code, Semantic code search across entire codebase using natural language queries

verdict: Both Gemini 3 Pro and Codeium are excellent AI tools. Your choice depends on specific needs: Gemini 3 Pro for llm, Codeium for ai-code-completion.
